content:
This is not related to Patient Corrections project, except in the broadest sense of realizing that all health data is not rigorously controlled.

If you want to spend 10-15 minutes reading an epic 2009 story, hold onto your hat and read this, including comments. For extra credit, chase the links. From 9 years ago this week: contains street language for body parts
Gimme My Damn Data: cancer patient Xeni finds a “ghost penis” in her bone scan
Well heck I would be motivated to get that corrected
